column1: Smoque BBQ////I got the 1/2 slab of ribs
column4: and their fries. So I loveeee Gale Street Inn's ribs
column5: but wondered if Smoque would be any similar but it was so different I'm not sure if I can compare. If Gale Street has lathered
column6: rich sauce all over the ribs with fall-of-the-bone tenderness
column9: home-made-bbq ribs. I felt that the BBQ sauce was lighter than super thick
